nodes.text: Jossie was an akk dog that belonged to the Coruscant Security Force. It would accompany its handler—who was a police officer—on patrol of the planet of Coruscant. During Order 66, which condemned all Jedi as traitors to the Galactic Republic, Jossie and its handler were flying patrol in a CSF assault ship, along with the ship's pilot, Vil, and Republic Commandos Darman and Niner.
Jossie appeared in Order 66: A Republic Commando Novel, written by Karen Traviss and published on September 16, 2008.
